bill_title: make an appropriation for the purchase of dive rescue and recovery equipment and associated training.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make an appropriation for the purchase of dive rescue and recovery equipment and associated training. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of fifty-four thousand dollars ($54,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Division of Emergency Management within the Department of Military and Veterans Affairs for the purchase of dive rescue and recovery equipment and related training. Of the money apropriated in this Act, fifty thousand dollars is authorized for the purchase of equipment and four thousand dollars is authorized for training expenses. Section 2. The secretary of the Department of Military and Veterans Affairs shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2003, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
